member.name: M:FuelTrackIntegrationFramework.OPCTunneller.OPCSyncGroupReadSession.PerformSyncGroupRead
member.summary:
Perform SyncGroupRead
Will attempt to reestablish SyncGroupReadSession if SessionFault has been detected.
Results will be cached in this object.
Throws: TimeoutException FaultException CommunicationException Exception
member.returns: True: If SyncGroupRead succeeds False:If SyncGroupRead fails due to reasons that may be transient in nature. Subsequent retries may even succeed.

member.name: M:FuelTrackIntegrationFramework.OPCTunneller.OPCSyncGroupReadSession.PerformSyncGroupRead(System.Boolean)
member.summary:
Performs SyncGroupRead
Throws: TimeoutException FaultException CommunicationException Exception
member.param: TRUE: Will attempt to reestablish SyncGroupReadSession if SessionFault has been detected.
